title: Fruity salad with Gruyere and cashews
ingredients: ['100g caster sugar', '125ml lemon juice', '2 teaspoons diced onion', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '150ml vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon poppy seeds', '1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces', '115g grated Gruyere cheese', '110g cashews', '4 tablespoons dried cranberries', '1 apple, peeled, cored and diced', '1 pear, peeled, cored and diced']
